ro.scoalainformala.cars

Class CarWash

  • java.lang.Object
    • ro.scoalainformala.cars.CarWash

  • public class CarWash
extends java.lang.Object

    This class models a car wash.

    The Car objects are held inside a LinkedList that models the wash queue.

    The class also keeps track of the clients that use the car wash.

    Author:
    Petru

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeShop()
      Closes the Car Wash.
      java.util.List<Car> getPostponedClients()
      Returns an ArrayList with all the clients that were in the wash queue but didn't get their car washed before the shop closed.
      java.util.List<Car> getTodaysClients()
      Returns an ArrayList with all the clients that got their car washed before the shop closed.
      void openShop()
      Opens the Car Wash.
      void standInLine(Car c)
      Adds a Car to the wash queue.
      void washCar()
      Removes the first Car from the wash queue and adds it to the HashSet that holds today's clients.
      void washCar(Car c)
      Removes the car provided as a parameter from the wash queue and adds it to the HashSet that holds today's clients.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CarWash

        public CarWash()

    • Method Detail

      • openShop

        public void openShop()
        Opens the Car Wash. New Collections are created for the internal fields that hold today's clients and the wash queue.

      • closeShop

        public void closeShop()
        Closes the Car Wash. When the shop is closed all the clients that were waiting in the wash queue are transfered to the postponed clients ArrayList. The washQueue is then emptied.

      • standInLine

        public void standInLine(Car c)
        Adds a Car to the wash queue.
        Parameters:
        c - The Car object to be added to the wash queue.

      • washCar

        public void washCar()
        Removes the first Car from the wash queue and adds it to the HashSet that holds today's clients.

      • washCar

        public void washCar(Car c)
        Removes the car provided as a parameter from the wash queue and adds it to the HashSet that holds today's clients.
        Parameters:
        c - the car to be washed

      • getTodaysClients

        public java.util.List<Car> getTodaysClients()
        Returns an ArrayList with all the clients that got their car washed before the shop closed.
        Returns:
        A new ArrayList that is a copy of the internal class field todaysClients

      • getPostponedClients

        public java.util.List<Car> getPostponedClients()
        Returns an ArrayList with all the clients that were in the wash queue but didn't get their car washed before the shop closed.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList with the postponed clients.
